pages.text: Feverweed grow in biomes that are warm and rainy. They grow in patches on the surface of the biome, and can be passed through safely.
pages.title: Feverweed Patches
Feverweed
pages.text: Feverweed is edible and provide Luck II and Hunger II when eaten, making it easier to get rare drops.
You can grow Feverweed by planting it on Grass or Dirt blocks and wait for it to spread slowly. It spreads similarly to a mushroom, but will spread regardless of light level
pages.title: Growing Feverweed
